item.title: Taron Egerton Says ‘I Don’t Think I’m a Good Choice’ for James Bond: It ‘Kind of Consumes Your Life’ and ‘Would Be Wasted on Me’
item.description: Taron Egerton is taking himself out of the running to be the next James Bond. Despite having experience in the spy genre as the lead of Matthew Vaughn’s “Kingsman” films, Egerton tol

item.title: Taron Egerton Says ‘I Don’t Think I’m a Good Choice’ for James Bond: It ‘Kind of Consumes Your Life’ and ‘Would Be Wasted on Me’
item.description: Taron Egerton is taking himself out of the running to be the next James Bond. Despite having experience in the spy genre as the lead of Matthew Vaughn’s “Kingsman” films, Egerton tol

item.title: Taron Egerton Rules Himself Out of the Running for James Bond: “It Would Be Wasted on Me”
item.description: “I’m too messy for that,” the ‘Kingsman’ star said about being Denis Villeneuve’s 007. “Also, it’s possibly not quite the thing that would make me happiest; it kind of consumes your life.”

item.title: Taron Egerton Rules Himself Out of the Running for James Bond: “It Would Be Wasted on Me”
item.description: “I’m too messy for that,” the ‘Kingsman’ star said about being Denis Villeneuve’s 007. “Also, it’s possibly not quite the thing that would make me happiest; it kind of consumes your life.”
